page.title: 17BIOGRAPHY.
page.content: I've been a policeman in Herne for nearly 10 years. I cycle round the area,I'm a community policeman.I'd rather do the job of a constable than take promotion and lose contact with the public. My working hours are eight hour shifts. My job is to go round calling on people,listening to their problems and trying to sort them out. I deal with people who have had their houses burgled,road traffic accidents and investigate sudden deaths. About 40 policemen cover the Herne Bay and Whitstable area in shifts.I work from 8a.m. until late afternoon,or 4p.m. till 2a.m. Life's a bit more hectic here than at my last posting on Romney Marsh which was just farms cows and sheep.
